TEXTFIELD.title: 1.No. of health workers in facility by cadre A) Clinical officer
E) CHVs Linked to the facility
No. of new health workers trained on Emergency Obstetric and Neonatal Care (EmONC) and by who - comment below
No. of new health workers trained on Integrated Management of Childhood Illness (IMCI), and by who - comment below
No. of new health workers trained in Infection Prevention Control (I.P.C) , and by who - comment below.
No. of new health workers trained in Focused Antenatal Care (FANC), and by who - comment below
No. of new health workers trained in Essential Newborn Care and by who - comment below
No. of new health workers trained in Elimination of Mother to Child Transmission (EMTCT) and by who- comment below
No. of new-borns initiating breastfeeding within 1 hour of birth
No. of children receiving Measles dose I ( 9 months )
No. of children receiving Measles ( 12-23 months)
No. of children with full vaccination (12-23 months)
No. of children receiving other vaccinations
No. of sick children < 5 years who seek care at a health facility
No. of children under 5 referred by CHVs
No. of women using contraceptives (obtained at health facility)
No. of women attending the 1st ANC visits
No. of women attending the 2nd and 3rd ANC visits
No. of women attending at least 4 ANC visits
No. of women whose blood pressure measurements taken during all ANC visits
No. of women receiving injections to control bleeding during the third stage of labour.
No. of deliveries assisted by trained personnel (health facility deliveries)
No. of women attending PNC visits in the reporting month
No. of women attending 1st PNC visit
No. of women attending 2nd PNC visits
No. of women attending at least 3 PNC visits
No. of women with home deliveries at night reporting to facilities for PNC
No. of obstetric night admissions at the selected facilities
No. of women seeking services from the selected facilities
No. of women referred by CHWs to the selected facilities
No. of women using APHRC ambulance
No. of children using APHRC ambulance

No. of women reporting to have efficiently used the ambulance services (specify which service)

No. of women referred to other facilities (specify where)
No. of women reporting satisfaction with the quality of service provided in the upgraded facilities
